title: Business Competency Enhancement: Mobile Modular Instructional Design for Orthodontic Graduate Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain core orthodontic theories with over 80% accuracy through VLE-based modules.
Learners can establish diagnostic plans with 90% accuracy using case-based simulations provided in a mobile environment.
Learners can complete project-based assessments 100% through online collaboration with peer learners and instructors.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
